text: Nedeljko Čubrilović (born 5 April 1953) is a Bosnian Serb politician. He was the 6th Speaker of the National Assembly of Republika Srpska from 2014 to 2022. In 2000, he joined the Democratic People's Alliance (DNS). Shortly after, he was elected as the 1st president of the newly established DEMOS on 22 December 2018 in Banja Luka. ==Personal life== Nedeljko is married to Miloja Čubrilović, and they have a son named Đuro and a daughter named Mirjana. They live in Banja Luka, where Nedeljko works. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the National Assembly of Republika Srpska
title: Nedeljko Čubrilović
